data.title: Sanyu: a fashion designer or maid? – Sanyu
data.meta_description: Sanyu's dream of going to university to study fashion design hangs in the balance as Matia and Nalweyiso put plans in motion to trade her off as a maid.
data.meta_site_name: Sanyu: a fashion designer or maid? – Sanyu
data.text:
Video

‘I’m not going back to Kirunda Fashions’ – Sanyu

Oscar lays it down for Sanyu and tells her he’s not going back to work for Kirunda Fashions. Meanwhile, Linda realises that Francis’ demise will affect Kirunda Fashions.

Video

Nambi vs the Gumes – Sanyu

Sanyu and Oscar are shocked to hear Nambi accusing them of trying to get rid of her from the company. She refuses to account for the missing money.

News

Unboxing June on Pearl Magic Prime

Get ready for an exciting June on Pearl Magic Prime as Sanyu bids farewell, Crossroads steps into the spotlight, and Beloved turns up the drama!
